headline: ADVANCED ILLUMINATION SL1236RGB
description:
LED Spotlight    Spotlights are suited for applications requiring a high degree of contrast on non-reflective objects. 
Spotlights can be used in place of other light types. 
LEDs can be aimed to create specific custom patterns, such as creating two separate areas of illumination.
